snippet: Though his motivation had never been lacking, a music teacher in Manhattan was hamstrung by the limitations of his own resources; he needed his own computer, and buying one was impossible.
abstract: Federation of Protestant Welfare Agencies provides grant for the purchase of a laptop computer to help Jeremy Coran of Manhattan continue teaching a music his local neighborhood center.
lead_paragraph: Though his motivation had never been lacking, a music teacher in Manhattan was hamstrung by the limitations of his own resources; he needed his own computer, and buying one was impossible.

headline.seo: Laptop Helps a Teacher Leave His Limitations Behind
